author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 40-year-old construction worker, A. Murugan of Vellaripatti, was found dead along Periyar Main Canal near Jothiyapatti under Othakadai police station limits on Tuesday night.

The police said that body of Murugan was found with cuts on the head and forehead around 6 p.m. The police could not identify the deceased immediately. Based on a complaint from P.K. Ravi, Kuruthur Village Administrative Officer, Othakadai police had registered a case of murder.

On Wednesday, the police established the identity of the deceased.

The police said that Murugan, an alcoholic, used to frequently quarrel with his wife Ayyammal. On Tuesday afternoon, he had lifted a laptop from his house and left.

Further investigation is on.
title: Construction worker found dead
